abstract: Arizona Gov Doug Ducey, critic of Common Core, urges state education officials to reconsider those standards for learning from kindergarten through high school; says they are example of federal government overstepping its bounds.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Doug Ducey, a critic of the Common Core, urged state officials to tailor the curriculum to the needs of Arizona students.

headline.main: Arizona Governor Seeks Review of Common Core Education Standards
headline.print_headline: Governor Seeks Review of Standards for Learning

snippet: Gov. Doug Ducey, a critic of the Common Core, urged state officials to tailor the curriculum to the needs of Arizona students.
